archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.5.6c: c) configured to include a register of keywords, electronic document characteristics and the specific types of sensitive information (sometimes referred to as pre-registration) that need to be protected from unauthorised disclosure
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
